titles: Seven irregragable propositions concerning oaths Dedicated to King Charles I. By the right reverend Dr. Jos. Hall, then Lord Bishop of Exon. And printed in the year 1639.
author: Hall, Joseph, 1574-1656.
notes: Caption title; suggested imprint from Wing.

Concerns oaths and covenants; a reprinting of the 1639 edition (STC 12646b). Lacks the dedication to King Charles I and the two 'corollaries' and has in addition a section with caption title: Questions concerning the validity of the late Act for the oath of abjuration.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
